author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SONIA WEAKENING, FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW TONIGHT...
summary: ...SONIA WEAKENING, FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW TONIGHT... As of 2:00 PM PDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Sonia was located near 15.3, -124.3 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...SONIA WEAKENING, FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW TONIGHT... As of 2:00 PM PDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Sonia was located near 15.3, -124.3 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1004 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Sonia (EP3/EP182025)
